tool_description: Analyzes skincare product ingredients for compatibility with specific skin types and concerns, identifying beneficial and potentially problematic components.

product_names.description: Names of skincare products to analyze

ingredient_lists.description: Ingredient lists for each product (must match product_names order)

skin_type.description: Primary skin type: dry, oily, combination, sensitive, normal

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: product_names and ingredient_lists must have same length
Invalid skin type: Use dry, oily, combination, sensitive, or normal
Empty ingredient list: Each product must have ingredient information
Too many products: Maximum 10 products can be analyzed at once
Invalid concerns array: Provide 1-5 skin concerns
usage: Provide product names with corresponding ingredient lists, specify skin type and concerns, optionally list allergies. Tool evaluates ingredient compatibility and flags potential issues.

beneficial_ingredients.description: Ingredients that benefit the specified skin type/concerns
